properties.name: Achorage Christian School
properties.description: Posted by Hakx anchorageACS, where I went to school for 3 of the 4 years I lived in Alaska.

properties.name: Apartment #1 in-Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Hakx This is the first apartment Sharron and I lived in. It was a large bachelor, just big enough for us and 2 cats.

properties.name: Apartment #2 in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is the second apartment that Sharron and I lived in. We still have 2 cats but one is new.

properties.name: CFB Petawawa, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is one of the Canadian military bases that we lived on. We moved here from Montana when I was about 6 until I was about 9.

properties.name: Childhood Rapids
properties.description: Posted by Hakxpetawawa, onThese are the rapids that we used to play round sometimes. Cathing frogs and exploring in the woods.

properties.name: Cold Lake, Alberta, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxCold lake, abThis is where my older sister was born.

properties.name: Confederation Bridge
properties.description: Posted by HakxCharlottetownThis is the bridge from New Brunswick to Prince Edward Island, it takes a long time to cross. I\'ve also crossed to PEI by way of ferry.

properties.name: Copper Mountain
properties.description: Posted by Hakxcopper mountain, coThis is huge ski resort in Colorado that we visited once. It\'s probably the furthest south I\'ve ever been, which isn\'t very south at all.

properties.name: Fairbanks, Alaska, USA
properties.description: Posted by Hakxfairbanks, alaskaI\'ve visited here.

properties.name: First French School
properties.description: Posted by Hakx I\'m pretty sure this is the first French school I went to while we live on the base, Ecole Colonel Forbes.

properties.name: Great Falls, Montana, USA
properties.description: Posted by Hakxgreat falls, montanaThis is where we moved to when I was about 3 months old until I was about 6 years old. I have nothing but good memories from this time. Me and my mom, dad, brother and sister and our dobermans shared a nice slplit level house with a big back yard.

properties.name: Ground Zero
properties.description: Posted by Hakxnew york, nyOn November 11th, 2001 at this location, the site of once tallest buildings in the world, the world trade center towers. Where 2 jumbo jets deliberately flew into each tower and the two towers collapsed on themselves killing a couple thousand people. Reconstruction is now under way at the site. The replacement is to be the tallest building in the world again.

properties.name: House #1 in-Anchorage, Alaska, USA
properties.description: Posted by Hakxanchorage, akThis is the first house we lived in while we were in Alaska. We lived here from the time I was 14 until I was 16.

properties.name: House #1 in-Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is the duplex we lived in on Rockliff Air Force Base when I was turning 18. We live here for about a year before we moved to Aylmer.

properties.name: House #2 in-Anchorage, Alaska, USA
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is the 2nd house we lived in while we were in Alaska. We lived here when I was about 17 until we moved back to Canada.

properties.name: House #2 in-Ottwa, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is the house I first lived in with Sharron for about 4 years.

properties.name: House in Aylmer
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is the house we lived in for about 5 years in Aylmer, Quebec, Canada.

properties.name: Kodiak Island
properties.description: Posted by Hakxkodiak, alaskaI cam here on a high school wrestling road trip. We saw some of the famous Kodiak bears with the white V on their cheasts.

properties.name: Pembroke, Ontario, Canada
properties.description: Posted by HakxThis is Shady Nook, where we lived from the time I was about 10 until I was about 13.

properties.name: Robert Service High School
properties.description: Posted by Hakx This is the second school I went to in Alaska, and the first public school I ever attended.

properties.name: Sept Isles, Quebec, Canada
properties.description: Posted by Hakx This is where I was born. We lived here until I was about 3 months old, consiquently I don\'t remember much about it. I would like to go visit it someday though.

properties.name: Swimming @ The Pit
properties.description: Posted by Hakx  This is where we\'d go and swim, camp, fish, drink and party sometimes.

properties.name: Top of the World
properties.description: Posted by Hakxbarrow, alaskaI visited here on a high school wrestling road trip in the middle of winter. They offered us Muk Tuk, whale blubber. Mmm chewy.

properties.name: Whitewater Rafting
properties.description: Posted by HakxRafting Rd, Whitewater Region, ONHere\'s where we went whitewater rafting.
